English (United States)(en-US): In a house at the far end of the road, there lived a boy.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 골목 구석 노란 지붕 집에는 한 아이가 살았어.

English (United States)(en-US): The boy grasped at his chest and swallowed, rolling his eyes this way and that.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 항상 가슴을 움켜쥐며 침을 삼키고, 눈을 도르륵도르륵 굴리던 아이가.

English (United States)(en-US): In his esophagus lived his twin brother.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 그 아이의 식도 안에는 그의 쌍둥이 형이 살았어.

English (United States)(en-US): The brother that died while growing inside their mother.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 어머니의 뱃속에서 함께 자라나다 죽어 버린 형이.

English (United States)(en-US): It lived inside the boy, with eyes just like him that rolled this way and that.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 아이와 닮은 눈을 도록도록 굴리며 식도 안에 살았어.

English (United States)(en-US): Perhaps it was born on the child's seventh birthday, of their grandma's ominous words.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 아마도 형은, 아이의 일곱 번째 생일날, 그들의 할머니가 한숨처럼 뱉은 말을 먹고 태어났을 거야.

English (United States)(en-US): "Ate his brother to be born, that one did."
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): “쯧… 사람 잡아먹고 태어난 놈.”

English (United States)(en-US): "His own brother at that..."
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): “지 형을 잡아먹고….”

English (United States)(en-US): The words tore through the boy's fragile heart.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 그 말은 아이의 연약한 가슴을 너무 쉬이 헤집었을 거야.

English (United States)(en-US): They seized him. Seized him with such a grip.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 아이를 움켜쥐었을 거야. 너무 세게 움켜쥔 나머지,

English (United States)(en-US): That stifling belief pierced through the boy's heart and laid roots.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 그 기이하고 퍽퍽한 믿음은 아이의 가슴을 꿰뚫고 뿌리 내렸을 거야.

English (United States)(en-US): It branched out within,
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 그것은 아이의 안에서 가지를 뻗어,

English (United States)(en-US): grew a single fruit,
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 동그란 열매를 맺고

English (United States)(en-US): and opened its eyes.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 눈을 뜨더니

English (United States)(en-US): And so it was born, the brother he ate.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): ‘형’이 되었어.

English (United States)(en-US): Somehow exactly like him, yet distorted, forever indigestible.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 오래오래 소화되지 않을, 아이와 똑 닮은, 형의 추하고 귀여운 얼굴이 되었어.

English (United States)(en-US): From then on the boy swallowed and swallowed, to push his brother down.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 그 이후로 그 아이는 무언가를 자주 삼켰어. 형의 존재를 들킬까 봐 두려웠거든.

English (United States)(en-US): His uncle’s pitying gaze, and the wail that leapt to his throat.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 삼촌의 딱한 눈빛도, 그 눈빛을 보고 튀어나오려던 억울한 비명도,

English (United States)(en-US): The fingers his friends pointed at him, and the protest that leapt to his throat.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 친구들의 손가락질도, 그 손가락을 보고 튀어나오려던 항변도.

English (United States)(en-US): The sorrows, the cries. The way people would stare and stare and stare.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 거대한 설움도, 조그마한 울음도. 수많은 사람들의 오싹한 눈빛도.

English (United States)(en-US): ‘Swallow. Swallow... Don't let it out.’
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): ‘삼켜. 삼켜. 삼켜. 삼켜야지. 삼켜야만 해.’

English (United States)(en-US): The child swallowed them all. Gulp gulp gulp, fresh vile vomit piling up.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 아이는 전부 삼켰어. 꿀, 꺽 넘어가며 그것들은 싱싱한 토사물로 쌓여 갔지만

English (United States)(en-US): but he dared not heave. In case they found out who lived in his esophagus.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 아이는 뱉어 낼 수 없었어. 식도 속 형의 존재를 들킬까 봐 두려웠으니까.

English (United States)(en-US): In case they found what he crammed deep inside.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 오래오래 감추고 싶었으니까.

English (United States)(en-US): Then one day, just as he was about to brush his teeth before bed,
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 그러던 어느 날, 그 애는 잠들기 전 이를 닦으려다가

English (United States)(en-US): he grasped at his chest and writhed as if he were being suffocated.
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 참아 낼 수 없는 답답함에 몸부림치며 가슴을 움켜쥐었어.

English (United States)(en-US): And,
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 그리고,

English (United States)(en-US): So,
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 그렇게,

English (United States)(en-US): But,
Korean (South Korea)(ko-KR): 그런데,
그렇게....
